title: Ticket #6649: python bindings submit should support multiple procs per cluster
description:
Submit using the python bindings differs from condor_submit when you have multiple queue statements. In condor_submit, you still end up with only a single cluster, but the python bindings make a new cluster each time you call the schedd.queue() method.

Also python bindings submit doesn't honor the max_materialize keyword. Both of these problems can be fixed by having the condor_submit and the python bindings use more common code to do this actual submission. In other words, more functionality needs to be moved from condor_submit into submit_utils.
